artist: Artist: Attributed to Domenico Tiepolo; Artist: Formerly attributed to Pietro Antonio de' Pietri
description: mounted on ivory sheet with blue-grey border; line sketch with enthroned Madonna and Christ child on very tall throne with at least two figures standing on right and one on left, another possible seated figure in front
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
provenance: [Yvonne Tan Bunzl, London, until 1976; sold July 6 for $400, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1976-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Madonna and Child with Saints (Sacra Conversazione)
